trans-unit.source: Enables data-bound control containers to identify a data item object for simplified data-binding operations.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer databundet kontrollen beholdere til å identifisere elementet dataobjektet for forenklet databinding operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Container classes that implement the IDataItemContainer interface can specify which of their properties identifies the data item for data-binding operations, such as late binding with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder> class.
trans-unit.target: Beholderklasser som implementerer grensesnittet IDataItemContainer kan angi hvilke av egenskapene identifiserer dataelementet for databinding operasjoner, for eksempel langsom binding med <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder>

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets an <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> that is used in simplified data-binding operations.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert, får en <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref> som er brukt i forenklet databinding operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The DataItem property identifies an object that is used in data-binding operations and late-binding expressions.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataItem identifiserer et objekt som er brukt i databinding operasjoner og -binding uttrykk.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> that represents the value to use when data-binding operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref> som representerer verdien som skal brukes når databinding operasjoner er utført.

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets the index of the data item bound to a control.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert, henter indeksen for dataelementet bundet til en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: In implementing classes such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, the DataItemIndex property is used to determine the index of the data item bound to the control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Implementere klasser som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, egenskapen DataItemIndex brukes til å fastsette indeksen for dataelementet bundet til kontrollen fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The DataItemIndex property does not refer to the index of the data item as displayed by the data control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataItemIndex refererer ikke til indeksen for dataelementet som vises av datakontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> representing the index of the data item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""> </xref> som representerer indeksen for dataelementet i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets the position of the data item as displayed in a control.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert, henter posisjonen for dataelementet som vises i en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: In implementing classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, the DisplayIndex property is set according to the index of the row among the displayed rows.
trans-unit.target: Implementere klasser som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, DisplayIndex-egenskapen er angitt i henhold til indeksen i raden mellom radene vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> representing the position of the data item as displayed in a control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""> </xref> som representerer posisjonen for dataelementet som vises i en kontroll.
